Package ar.com.hjg.pngj

Contains the main classes for the PNGJ library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ImageInfo Simple immutable wrapper for basic image info Some parameters are redundant, but the constructor takes an 'ortogonal' subset
ImageLine Lightweight wrapper for an image scanline, used for read and write.
ImageLineHelper Bunch of utility static methods to process/analyze an image line.
PngHelper Some utility static methods.
PngReader Reads a PNG image, line by line
PngWriter Writes a PNG image, line by line.
 

Enum Summary
PngFilterType Internal PNG predictor filter, or strategy to select it.
 

Exception Summary
PngjBadCrcException  
PngjException  
PngjInputException  
PngjOutputException  
PngjUnsupportedException  
 

Package ar.com.hjg.pngj Description

Contains the main classes for the PNGJ library.

Client code should rarely need more than the public members of this package.

See also the nosandbox package if available.
